message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A service enquiry must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASE_PARTICIPANT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A case participant role must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CREATELINK_XRV_LINK_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_AND_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: A Service Enquiry Link already exists to this Service Enquiry for participant %1s.
